item.title: 奥特曼回应成人内容争议：我们不是世界道德警察
item.guid: 奥特曼回应成人内容争议：我们不是世界道德警察
item.description:
According to CNBC, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently stated in response to criticism about relaxing ChatGPT's content restrictions, "We are not the world's chosen moral police." 据 CNBC 报道，日前，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 在回应外界对其放宽 ChatGPT 内容限制的批评时表示，「我们并非世界选出的道德警察（moral police）」。

Previously, Altman announced that adult themes, including erotic content, would be allowed online, sparking widespread controversy. 此前，奥特曼宣布将允许包括情色内容在内的成人主题上线，引发广泛争议。

He posted on social media platform X, stating that as the company develops new technological tools and alleviates "serious mental health issues," it is now able to "safely relax" most content restrictions. 他在社交媒体 X 平台发文称，随着公司开发出新的技术工具，并缓解了「严重的心理健康问题」，现在已能够「安全地放宽」大部分内容限制。

Altman emphasized that OpenAI will adhere to the principle of "treating adults as adults," but will still not allow any content that could cause harm to others. He cited that this is similar to how society sets boundaries for R-rated movies. 奥特曼强调，OpenAI 将坚持「把成年人当作成年人对待」的原则，但仍不会允许任何可能对他人造成伤害的内容存在。他举例称，这与社会对 R 级电影等设定界限的方式类似。

It is worth noting that this statement contrasts with what Altman said in a podcast in August this year. 值得注意的是，这一表态与奥特曼今年 8 月在播客节目中的说法形成对比。

At the time, he stated that he was "proud" that OpenAI refused to launch features like "sex robot avatars" that offered short-term growth stimulation. 当时他曾表示，为 OpenAI 拒绝推出「性爱机器人头像」等短期刺激增长的功能感到「自豪」。

Meanwhile, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has launched an investigation into OpenAI and other companies, focusing on whether chatbots have a negative impact on minors. 与此同时，美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）已对 OpenAI 等公司展开调查，关注聊天机器人是否会对未成年人产生负面影响。

OpenAI recently also launched parental control features and is developing an age prediction system to automatically enable youth mode for users under 18. OpenAI 近期也推出家长控制功能，并正在开发年龄预测系统，以便自动为 18 岁以下用户启用青少年模式。

Altman admitted that the public reaction to this policy adjustment "far exceeded expectations." 奥特曼承认，此次政策调整引发的舆论反应「远超预期」。

The National Center on Sexual Exploitation (NCOSE) called on OpenAI to revoke its decision to allow erotic content online, stating that "sexualized AI chatbots are inherently high-risk and pose real mental health harms due to synthesized intimacy." 美国全国反性剥削中心（NCOSE）则呼吁 OpenAI 撤销允许情色内容上线的决定，称「性化的 AI 聊天机器人本质上具有高风险，会因合成亲密关系而带来真实的心理健康危害」。

item.title: 4399 起，国内首款 eSIM 手机 OPPO Find X9 系列正式发布
item.guid: 4399-起，国内首款-eSIM-手机-OPPO-Find-X9-系列正式发布
item.description:
Yesterday, OPPO held a new product launch event, officially unveiling its annual flagship Find X9 series. 昨天，OPPO 召开新品发布会，正式推出年度旗舰 Find X9 系列。

As a new generation of flagship models, the Find X9 series has undergone comprehensive upgrades in performance, imaging, system, and battery life. All models are equipped with the Dimensity 9500 chip and debut with ColorOS 16, supporting one-click flash notes, AI real-scene dialogue, and Xiaobu suggestions. It features three self-developed core technologies: Aurora Engine, Tide Engine, and Star Compiler, and also supports linkage with Apple devices and one-tap transfer. 作为新一代旗舰机型，Find X9 系列在性能、影像、系统和续航方面全面升级，全系搭载天玑 9500 芯片，并首发搭载 ColorOS 16，支持一键闪记、AI 实景对话、小布建议，搭载极光引擎、潮汐引擎、繁星编译器三大自研核心技术，还支持与苹果设备联动、一碰互传。

The Find X9 series continues its deep collaboration with Hasselblad, offering an optional Hasselblad Professional Imaging Kit, supporting 4K ultra-clear live photos and telephoto macro photography, positioning itself as a "travel photography artifact." Find X9 系列继续与哈苏深度合作，可选哈苏专业影像套装，支持 4K 超清实况照片与长焦微距拍摄，定位「旅拍神器」。

It is worth noting that OPPO also officially announced at the press conference that the OPPO Find X9 Pro Satellite Communication Edition will support eSIM, making it the first domestic mobile phone to support eSIM in mainland China. 值得注意的是，OPPO 还在发布会上官宣，OPPO Find X9 Pro 卫星通讯版将支持 eSIM，这也是国产手机阵营里第一台支持中国大陆 eSIM 的手机。

According to iFanr, the OPPO Find X9 Pro Satellite Communication Edition, which supports eSIM, is identical to other versions in terms of hardware functions and also comes with a physical card slot. However, users can also go to a carrier's business hall to activate an eSIM phone card. 据爱范儿了解，支持 eSIM 的 OPPO Find X9 Pro 卫星通讯版与其他版本在硬件功能上无异，同样配备实体卡槽，但与此同时，用户可以前往运营商营业厅，开通 eSIM 电话卡。

🔗 Related reading: First domestic eSIM phone released! Keep this card activation guide handy 🔗 相关阅读： 首台国产 eSIM 手机发布！这份开卡攻略请收好

    Front 32Mp lens; rear 50Mp LYT808 main camera + 50Mp JN5 ultra-wide-angle + LYT600 periscope + 2Mp Danxia original color lens;

item.title: Sora 2 更新：Pro 用户可用分镜板，视频时长上限提升至 25 秒
item.guid: Sora-2-更新：Pro-用户可用分镜板，视频时长上限提升至-25-秒
item.description:
OpenAI announced today that its video generation model Sora has received two significant updates: OpenAI 今日宣布，旗下视频生成模型 Sora 迎来两项重要更新：

    Pro users can now use the "Storyboard" feature on the web version;

    All users can generate videos up to 15 seconds long on both the app and web versions, while Pro users on the web version have their duration limit increased to 25 seconds.

According to the official introduction, the storyboard feature allows users to directly select the "storyboard" option in the creation interface, helping them build video content more intuitively through shot transitions and scene planning. Some users have reported that the download button on the current web version is abnormal, and video files cannot be exported normally after clicking. 官方介绍称，分镜板功能可在创作界面中直接选择「storyboard」选项，帮助用户通过镜头切换与场景规划更直观地构建视频内容。部分用户反馈称，当前网页版的下载按钮存在异常，点击后无法正常导出视频文件。

item.title: ChatGPT 推出自动记忆管理功能，告别「记忆已满」限制
item.guid: ChatGPT-推出自动记忆管理功能，告别「记忆已满」限制
item.description:
Yesterday, OpenAI announced on X that ChatGPT now supports automatic management of user-saved memories, resolving the previous "memory full" limitation. 昨天，OpenAI 在 X 上发文宣布，ChatGPT 现已支持自动管理用户保存的记忆功能，解决了此前「记忆已满」的限制问题。

According to the introduction, users can not only search and sort memories chronologically but also choose to re-prioritize them in the settings. This feature will be gradually rolled out to global Plus and Pro users on the web starting today. 据介绍，用户不仅可以按时间顺序搜索和排序记忆，还能在设置中选择重新设定优先级。该功能将从今日起面向全球 Plus 和 Pro 用户在网页端逐步推出。

Some users previously reported that when encountering the "memory full" prompt, they could not continue to use the core context feature, and even hoped to expand storage space through paid methods. This update is considered a direct response to this issue. 有用户此前反馈称，遇到「保存记忆已满」的提示时，无法继续使用最核心的上下文功能，甚至希望能通过付费方式扩展存储空间。此次更新被认为是对这一问题的直接回应。

However, some users have also suggested that they hope to support manual editing or adding memories in the future, without requiring assistant operations. For example, when only modifying a few words or deleting some content, the existing process is still cumbersome. 不过，也有部分用户提出，希望未来能够支持手动编辑或新增记忆，而无需通过助手操作。例如仅修改几个字或删除部分内容时，现有流程仍显繁琐。

item.title: 乔布斯登上 2026 年 1 美元纪念币
item.guid: 乔布斯登上-2026-年-1-美元纪念币
item.description:
On October 15, local time, the U.S. Mint officially unveiled the design for the 2026 "American Innovation" $1 commemorative coin. 当地时间 10 月 15 日，美国铸币局正式公布了 2026 年「美国创新」1 美元纪念币的设计方案。

Among them, the most notable is the inclusion of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs. 其中，最受瞩目的莫过于苹果公司联合创始人史蒂夫·乔布斯的入选。

His image will appear on the California-themed commemorative coin, alongside Norman Borlaug, the "Father of the Green Revolution" from Iowa, the Cray-1 supercomputer from Wisconsin, and mobile refrigeration technology from Minnesota. 他的形象将出现在加利福尼亚州主题的纪念币上，与爱荷华州的「绿色革命之父」诺曼·鲍洛格、威斯康星州的 Cray-1 超级计算机、明尼苏达州的移动制冷技术一同被铭刻。

According to the U.S. Mint, the "American Innovation" $1 Coin Program launched in 2018 and is expected to continue until 2032, covering 50 states, the District of Columbia, and 5 U.S. territories. 根据美国铸币局介绍，「美国创新」1 美元纪念币计划自 2018 年启动，预计持续至 2032 年，涵盖 50 个州、哥伦比亚特区及 5 个海外领地。

The series aims to honor individuals and achievements that have made groundbreaking contributions in science, technology, humanities, and other fields through circulating commemorative coins. 该系列旨在通过流通纪念币的形式，致敬在科学、技术、人文等领域作出突破性贡献的个人与成就。

Jobs' design depicts him in contemplation in the California hills during his youth, accompanied by the words "STEVE JOBS" and "MAKE SOMETHING WONDERFUL," symbolizing his philosophy of transforming complex technology into intuitive experiences. 乔布斯的设计方案展现了他年轻时在加州丘陵地带沉思的场景，辅以「STEVE JOBS」与「MAKE SOMETHING WONDERFUL」字样，象征其将复杂科技转化为直观体验的理念。

Throughout his life, Jobs spearheaded the creation of products such as Macintosh, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, profoundly transforming the global tech industry and public lifestyles. 乔布斯一生推动了 Macintosh、iPod、iPhone、iPad 等产品的诞生，深刻改变了全球科技产业与大众生活方式。

Notably, the 2026 commemorative coin coincides with the 250th anniversary of the founding of the United States, and the obverse will specially feature the Liberty Bell and a gear mark with "250" to commemorate this historical milestone. 值得注意的是，2026 年的纪念币正值美国建国 250 周年，硬币正面将特别加入自由钟与「250」字样的齿轮标记，以呼应这一历史节点。

item.title: 苹果 AI 搜索负责人跳槽 Meta，Siri 改造计划再遇波折
item.guid: 苹果-AI-搜索负责人跳槽-Meta，Siri-改造计划再遇波折
item.description:
According to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Ke Yang, an Apple executive in charge of AI search projects, is about to leave and join Meta. 据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 报道，苹果公司负责 AI 搜索项目的高管 Ke Yang 即将离职，加入 Meta。

This change comes just weeks after he took over the "Answers, Knowledge and Information" (AKI) team. 这一变动发生在他刚刚接手「Answers, Knowledge and Information」（直译为「答案、知识和信息」，简称 AKI）团队数周之后。

The team's task is to enhance Siri with ChatGPT-like capabilities, enabling it to retrieve information from the web in real-time. 该团队的任务是为 Siri 增强类 ChatGPT 功能，使其能够从网络实时获取信息。

Sources revealed that Ke Yang's departure is the latest in a series of high-level exits from Apple's AI division. 知情人士透露，Ke Yang 的离开是苹果人工智能部门近期一系列高层出走中的最新一例。

Since the beginning of this year, about a dozen core members have left Apple's foundational model team, with some also moving to Meta to join its newly established "Superintelligence Labs". 今年以来，已有约十余名核心成员离开苹果基础模型团队，其中部分人同样转投 Meta，加入其新成立的「Superintelligence Labs」。

Apple originally planned to launch a new version of Siri in March 2025, integrating search functions developed by the AKI team and completing several previously delayed features, including calling upon personal data to handle more complex requests. 苹果原计划在 2025 年 3 月推出全新版本的 Siri，整合 AKI 团队研发的搜索功能，并补齐此前推迟的多项特性，包括调用个人数据以处理更复杂的请求。

This project is seen as a crucial step for Apple to catch up with competitors such as OpenAI, Perplexity, and Google Gemini. 该项目被视为苹果追赶 OpenAI、Perplexity 以及 Google Gemini 等竞争对手的重要举措。

Following Ke Yang's departure, the AKI team will be taken over by Apple Vice President Benoit Dupin, who currently oversees machine learning-related cloud infrastructure. 随着 Ke Yang 的离职，AKI 团队将转由苹果副总裁 Benoit Dupin 接管，他目前负责机器学习相关的云基础设施。

item.title: Nothing：苹果 MagSafe 专利限制阻碍安卓手机普及磁吸无线充电
item.guid: Nothing：苹果-MagSafe-专利限制阻碍安卓手机普及磁吸无线充电
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Nothing recently stated in a video that the Android camp's slow adoption of magnetic wireless charging is primarily due to restrictions from Apple's related patents. 据 Android Authority 报道，Nothing 近日在一段视频中直言，Android 阵营迟迟未能普及磁吸式无线充电，主要原因在于苹果相关专利的限制。

According to Nothing's content team, although Qi2 has become an open wireless charging standard, the magnet arrangement scheme fully compatible with Apple's MagSafe is patent-protected. If Android manufacturers want to circumvent this restriction, they can only develop their own magnetic system. 根据 Nothing 内容团队的解释，虽然 Qi2 已经成为开放的无线充电标准，但与苹果 MagSafe 完全兼容的磁铁排布方案受到专利保护，Android 厂商若要绕过这一限制，只能自行研发一套磁吸系统。

This could not only lead to inaccurate coil alignment and reduced charging efficiency but also cause additional heat generation. 这不仅可能导致线圈无法精准对齐、充电效率下降，还会带来额外的发热问题。

Nothing pointed out that developing an independent magnetic wireless charging system could cost over $10 million. For most manufacturers, such an investment is difficult to recoup, so they prefer to add magnets to protective cases rather than integrate them into the phone body. Nothing 指出，开发一套独立的磁吸无线充电系统，成本可能高达 1000 万美元以上。对于多数厂商而言，这样的投入难以收回，因此宁可选择在保护壳中加入磁铁，而非在手机本体中集成。

item.title: 机构：三季度全球手机出货量增长 4%，小米稳居第三
item.guid: 机构：三季度全球手机出货量增长-4%，小米稳居第三
item.description:
According to the latest data released by Counterpoint Research, global smartphone shipments in Q3 2025 increased by 4% year-on-year, primarily driven by strong demand in the Asia-Pacific and Middle East & Africa markets. 根据 Counterpoint Research 公布的最新数据，2025 年 Q3 全球智能手机出货量同比增长 4%，主要受亚太及中东非市场的强劲需求推动。

Samsung continues to lead with a 19% market share, with its mid-range Galaxy A series new models A17 and A07 performing exceptionally well, and the Galaxy Z Fold7 receiving positive feedback in the foldable phone market. 三星以 19% 的市场份额继续领跑，其中端 Galaxy A 系列新机型 A17 与 A07 表现突出，同时 Galaxy Z Fold7 在折叠屏市场获得积极反馈。

Apple, meanwhile, became the fastest-growing brand among the top five manufacturers, with shipments increasing by 9% year-on-year, and the iPhone 17 series setting new pre-sale records in multiple regions. 苹果则成为前五大厂商中增速最快的品牌，出货量同比增长 9%，iPhone 17 系列在多地预售创下新高。

Xiaomi held steady in third place with a 14% share, growing 2% year-on-year, with strong performance in Southeast Asia and the Middle East & Africa markets. OPPO and vivo ranked fourth and fifth respectively, maintaining steady growth through economical 5G models and regional expansion. 小米以 14% 的份额稳居第三，同比增长 2%，在东南亚和中东非市场表现亮眼。OPPO 与 vivo 分列第四和第五，分别依靠经济型 5G 机型与区域扩张保持稳健增长。

Furthermore, Google's shipments surged by 18% year-on-year, driven by the strong sales of its Pixel 9 series and deep integration of AI features, making it the most prominent emerging brand this quarter. 此外，谷歌凭借 Pixel 9 系列的热销及 AI 功能的深入整合，出货量同比大增 18%，成为本季度表现最突出的新兴品牌。

Analysts pointed out that demand for high-end models remains strong in developed markets, while emerging markets like India, Japan, and the Middle East & Africa are driven by economical 5G devices and festive season demand. However, the overall growth rate remains moderate due to a slowdown in inventory reduction strategies in the Chinese market and insufficient consumer confidence in the Latin American market. 分析师指出，发达市场对高端机型需求依旧旺盛，而印度、日本及中东非等新兴市场则由经济型 5G 设备和节庆季需求拉动增长。不过，中国市场因去库存策略放缓，拉美市场则受消费者信心不足影响，整体增速仍显温和。

item.title: 逐际动力全尺寸人形机器人 Oli 上演「空中瑜伽」出厂测试
item.guid: 逐际动力全尺寸人形机器人-Oli-上演「空中瑜伽」出厂测试
item.description:
Yesterday, LimX Dynamics released a video demonstrating the pre-delivery testing of its full-size humanoid robot Oli , which the company calls "aerial yoga," with a special emphasis in the description: "Do not imitate, but challenges are welcome." 昨天，逐际动力 LimX Dynamics 发布了一段展示其全尺寸人形机器人 Oli 出厂前测试的视频，官方称其为「空中瑜伽」，并在描述中特别强调「请勿模仿，但欢迎挑战」。

In the video, Oli performed a series of motion tests — comprehensively verifying the robot's joint precision, posture control, and motion coordination through multi-degree-of-freedom collaborative movements of its entire body joints. 画面中，Oli 进行了一系列动作测试 —— 通过全身关节的多自由度协同运动，对机器人关节精度、姿态控制与运动协调性进行全面验证。

According to the official introduction, this test movement is an original design aimed at verifying the robot's structural reliability and control algorithm stability in dynamic postures. 官方介绍称，这一测试动作为原创设计，旨在检验机器人在动态姿态下的结构可靠性与控制算法稳定性。

As an embodied AI robotics company, LimX Dynamics has long focused on introducing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) capabilities into physical robots, exploring the generalization potential of intelligent agents in the physical world. 作为一家具身智能机器人公司，逐际动力 LimX Dynamics 长期专注于将通用人工智能（AGI）能力引入实体机器人中，探索智能体在物理世界的泛化潜能。

It is understood that Oli is LimX Dynamics' flagship full-size humanoid robot, featuring a high-degree-of-freedom motion system and high-precision sensing architecture, enabling dexterous manipulation, rapid balancing, and multi-modal autonomous learning. 据悉，Oli 是逐际动力的代表性全尺寸人形机器人，具备高自由度运动系统与高精度传感架构，可实现灵巧操作、快速平衡与多模式自主学习。

item.title: 阅文创作大会发布「全球潮玩共创计划」，AI 升级助力 IP 全链路
item.guid: 阅文创作大会发布「全球潮玩共创计划」，AI-升级助力-IP-全链路
item.description:
Yesterday, the 2025 China Literature Creator Conference was held in Wuhan Optics Valley. This year marks the 10th anniversary of China Literature's establishment, and the conference, themed "Towards the Light," brought together hundreds of creators and partners from various industry chains, including online literature, film and television, animation, short dramas, and derivative consumption. 昨天，2025 阅文创作大会在武汉光谷举行，今年恰逢阅文成立 10 周年，大会以「向光而行」为主题，汇聚网络文学、影视、动漫、短剧、衍生消费等产业链数百位创作者与合作伙伴。

Hou Xiaonan, CEO and President of China Literature, announced several business upgrades on-site, covering comic dramas, short dramas, trendy toys, AI application capabilities, etc., proposing to build the second growth curve of IP value with "IP + AI + Consumption" as the core. 阅文集团 CEO 兼总裁侯晓楠在现场宣布多项业务升级，涵盖漫剧短剧、潮玩、AI 应用能力等，提出以「IP + AI + 消费」为核心，构建 IP 价值的第二增长曲线。

Regarding content strategy, China Literature announced the upgrade of its "Creator Partnership Program," officially entering the comic drama track while deepening its focus on short dramas. 在内容布局方面，阅文宣布升级「创作合伙人计划」，在深耕短剧的同时正式进军漫剧赛道。

China Literature will open up 100,000 high-quality IPs, establish a special fund of 100 million yuan, and launch AIGC tools such as "Comic Drama Assistant" to improve the efficiency of comic drama adaptations. Currently, 30 comic dramas have exceeded 10 million views, and works like "The Great Ming Son-in-Law" and "Invincible Simulation System" have surpassed 100 million views. 阅文将开放 10 万部精品 IP，设立亿元专项基金，并推出「漫剧助手」等 AIGC 工具，推动漫剧改编效率提升。目前已有 30 部漫剧播放量突破千万，《大明贤婿》《刷爆无敌模拟系统》等作品播放量破亿。

In terms of consumer ecosystem, China Literature released the "Global Trendy Toy Co-creation Plan," intending to collaborate with the world's top 100 artists to incubate original trendy toy IPs and open up full-chain capabilities from design, production to distribution. 在消费生态方面，阅文发布「全球潮玩共创计划」，计划携手全球百大艺术家孵化原创潮玩 IP，并开放从设计、生产到发行的全链条能力。

In terms of technological empowerment, Huang Yan, Senior Vice President of China Literature Group, announced three major AI application upgrades, including "Miaobi Tongjian" for deep understanding of millions of words of online literature, "Copyright Assistant" for precise book selection, and the one-stop "Comic Drama Assistant," covering the entire process of creation, adaptation, and derivation. 在技术赋能方面，阅文集团高级副总裁黄琰发布三大 AI 应用升级，包括千万字网文深度理解能力「妙笔通鉴」、精准选书的「版权助手」以及一站式「漫剧助手」，覆盖创作、改编和衍生的全流程。

Additionally, China Literature announced that two online literature works have surpassed 300,000 average subscriptions for the first time, setting a new industry record, and launched the "University Student Story Entrepreneurship Program" to support young creators. The "iFlytek Qidian Reader," jointly launched by iFlytek and Qidian Reading, was also unveiled at the conference. 此外，阅文还宣布两部网文作品首次突破 30 万均订，刷新行业纪录，并启动「大学生故事创业计划」扶持年轻创作者。会上还发布了由科大讯飞与起点读书联合推出的「讯飞起点阅读器」。

Hou Xiaonan stated: "The next decade will be the golden age of Chinese super IPs. China Literature will walk hand in hand with creators and partners with great content, a large ecosystem, and hard technology." 侯晓楠表示：「下一个十年，将是中国超级 IP 的黄金时代。阅文将以好内容、大生态、硬科技，与创作者和合作伙伴并肩同行。」

item.title: 💡 硅谷精神之父：AI 的发展会让人类更聪明、更优秀
item.guid: 💡-硅谷精神之父：AI-的发展会让人类更聪明、更优秀
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, yesterday, at the 2025 Sustainable Global Leaders Conference, Kevin Kelly, founding editor of Wired magazine and author of "What Technology Wants," engaged in a dialogue with Zhu Ning, professor at Shanghai Advanced Institute of Finance, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. 据新浪财经报道，昨天，在 2025 可持续全球领导者大会上，《连线》杂志创始主编、《2049》作者凯文·凯利与上海交通大学上海高级金融学院教授朱宁展开对话。

Kelly stated that the application prospects of AI in education are very optimistic, as it can not only equalize educational resources but also make the learning process more efficient, allowing every child to learn at their own pace and in their own way. 凯利表示，AI 在教育领域的应用前景十分乐观，不仅能够实现教育资源的均衡化，还能让学习过程更加高效，每个孩子都能以自己的方式和速度学习。

Kelly pointed out that the biggest surprise of AI lies in the cultivation and transformation of thinking abilities, especially in breakthroughs in scenarios such as language translation and spatial intelligence. 凯利指出，AI 最大的惊喜在于思维能力的培养与变化，尤其是在语言翻译和空间智能等场景的突破。

He emphasized that "AI large language models know more than any human, but their way of thinking is different from humans" , and through neural networks and deep learning, AI can solve problems in entirely new ways. 他强调 「AI 大语言模型比任何人类知道的都要多，但它们的思考方式与人类不同」 ，通过神经网络和深度学习，AI 能以全新的路径解决问题。

He also mentioned that China has shown extremely high efficiency in AI applications, stating, "Perhaps future super network AI will emerge in China, which is a very good opportunity." 他还提到，中国在 AI 应用方面展现出极高效率，「或许未来的超级网络 AI 会在中国出现，这是一个非常好的机会」。

Regarding external concerns about "whether AI will replace humans," Kelly believes that the development of AI will continuously push humanity to become smarter and better , and the key lies in endowing AI with ethics and morality. 对于外界担忧的「AI 是否会取代人类」问题，凯利认为， AI 的发展将不断推动人类变得更聪明、更优秀 ，关键在于赋予 AI 伦理与道德感。

He also emphasized that in the long run, AI will help humanity accelerate the development of green culture and solve some problems that humans themselves find difficult to resolve. 他同时强调，长期来看，AI 将帮助人类加速绿色文化的发展，解决一些人类自身难以解决的问题。

item.title: 卢伟冰：K90 不排斥和小米直接竞争
item.guid: 卢伟冰：K90-不排斥和小米直接竞争
item.description:
Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, stated in his latest announcement that the REDMI K90 series will serve as the "second battle" in the group's flagship new product launch season and has redefined the positioning of the K series. 小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰在最新发声中表示，REDMI K90 系列将在集团旗舰新品发布季中担纲「第二战」，并刷新了 K 系列的定位。

He emphasized that the K90 series will "not limit product definition by price, not differentiate technology by brand, and even not exclude direct competition with Xiaomi ." 他强调，K90 系列将「不以价格来限制产品定义，不以品牌做技术区隔， 甚至不排斥和小米直接竞争 」。

According to reports, the K90 series has two major changes this time: 据介绍，K90 系列此次有两大变化：

    Release time brought forward: from November in previous years to October.

    New Pro Max version: This is the group's second Pro Max model this year, aiming to "achieve everything in one go and dominate the 4K+ price segment" with its ultra-strong product power.

Among them, the K90 Pro Max will continue its "stronger always stronger" trend in traditional advantages such as performance, battery life, and screen, and achieve comprehensive breakthroughs in core experiences like texture, imaging, and sound, with some areas even expected to lead the industry. 其中，K90 Pro Max 将在性能、续航、屏幕等传统优势上延续「强者恒强」，并在质感、影像、声音等核心体验上实现全面突破，部分领域甚至有望引领行业。

Lu Weibing stated that REDMI's leap is not just a "strategic shift" at the product level, but also an embodiment of the K series' new mission. The K90 and K90 Pro Max will be co-originated and co-exist, collectively carrying Xiaomi's latest technological achievements. 卢伟冰称，REDMI 的此次跃升不仅是产品层面的「变阵」，更是 K 系列全新使命的体现。K90 与 K90 Pro Max 将同源共生，集中承载小米最新技术成果。

item.title: 259.85 万起，法拉利 Amalfi 硬顶超跑中国首发
item.guid: 259.85-万起，法拉利-Amalfi-硬顶超跑中国首发
item.description:
Yesterday, the Ferrari Amalfi hardtop supercar officially debuted in the Chinese market. The official suggested retail price starts from 2.5985 million yuan, with the first batch of deliveries expected to begin in the fourth quarter of 2026. 昨天，法拉利 Amalfi 硬顶超跑在中国市场正式亮相，官方公布建议零售价为 259.85 万元起，预计将在 2026 年第四季度开启首批交付。

According to reports, as the successor to the Roma, the Amalfi continues the classic concept of a hardtop Berlinetta, with comprehensive upgrades in aerodynamics, interior technology, and power performance. 据介绍，作为 Roma 的继任车型，Amalfi 延续了硬顶 Berlinetta 的经典理念，并在空气动力学、内饰科技与动力性能上全面升级。

In terms of appearance, the Amalfi eliminates the traditional grille, adopting a floating front wing and hidden door handle design, equipped with 20-inch wheels and high-performance tires. The rear features a dual-sided quad-exhaust system and an active spoiler, which can switch between three modes: low drag, medium downforce, and high downforce. 外观方面，Amalfi 取消了传统格栅，采用悬浮式前翼与隐藏式门把手设计，配备 20 英寸轮毂及高性能轮胎。车尾部分搭载双边共四出排气与主动式扰流板，可在低风阻、中档下压力和高档下压力三种模式间切换。

The interior is equipped with a 15.6-inch digital instrument cluster, a 10.25-inch central control screen, and an 8.8-inch passenger screen, supporting Apple CarPlay, wireless charging, and an optional Burmester sound system. The seats are available in three specifications, supporting massage and ventilation functions. 内饰配备 15.6 英寸数字仪表、10.25 英寸中控屏与 8.8 英寸副驾屏，支持 Apple CarPlay、无线充电及可选柏林之声音响系统。座椅提供三种规格，支持按摩与通风功能。

In terms of power, the Amalfi is equipped with a 3.9T V8 engine, with a maximum power of 640 horsepower, peak torque of 760 N·m, 0-100km/h acceleration in 3.3 seconds, and a top speed of 320km/h. 动力方面，Amalfi 搭载 3.9T V8 发动机，最大功率 640 马力，峰值扭矩 760 N·m，0-100km/h 加速 3.3 秒，极速可达 320km/h。

item.title: Manus 1.5 发布：全面升级原生 AI Web 应用构建能力
item.guid: Manus-1.5-发布：全面升级原生-AI-Web-应用构建能力
item.description:
Today, AI agent platform Manus announced the launch of its new version, Manus 1.5. 今天，AI 智能体平台 Manus 宣布推出全新版本 Manus 1.5。

The official statement indicates that this update has achieved comprehensive improvements in speed and performance, further validating the versatility of its core architecture. 官方表示，本次更新在速度与性能方面实现了全面提升，并进一步验证了其核心架构的通用性。

Unlike traditional "AI website builders," the Manus team emphasizes that they are not merely developing a tool, but continuously evolving the underlying framework and equipping it with appropriate functional modules. Thanks to this approach, Manus achieved "sota-level" AI Web application building capabilities in just one month. 与传统的「AI 网站生成器」不同，Manus 团队强调，他们并非单纯开发一款工具，而是持续进化底层框架，并为其配备合适的功能模块。得益于这一思路，Manus 在短短一个月内便实现了「sota 级别」的 AI Web 应用构建能力。

It is worth noting that Manus 1.5's new capabilities are deeply integrated with the platform's existing features. For example, users can quickly build service introduction websites, and after collecting customer information, trigger subsequent tasks through the Manus client and email pushes, such as automatically generating personalized slides. 值得注意的是，Manus 1.5 的新能力与平台现有功能深度打通。例如，用户可快速搭建服务介绍网站，并在收集到客户信息后，通过 Manus 客户端和邮件推送触发后续任务，如自动生成个性化幻灯片。

The official statement indicates that this enhanced feature is now available to all users, and the underlying infrastructure is part of the team's broader vision — to create a platform where anyone can harness the full power of cloud computing and AI through conversation. 官方表示，这一增强功能已面向所有用户开放，其背后的基础设施是团队更宏大愿景的一部分 —— 打造一个任何人都能通过对话调用云计算与 AI 全部力量的平台。

item.title: 豆包上新四款大模型，支持分档思考长度、智能路由等
item.guid: 豆包上新四款大模型，支持分档思考长度、智能路由等
item.description:
Yesterday, at the FORCE LINK AI Innovation Roadshow in Wuhan, Volcengine officially released and upgraded four Doubao large models, including Doubao Large Model 1.6 upgraded version, Doubao Large Model 1.6 lite, Doubao Speech Synthesis Model 2.0, and Doubao Voice Cloning Model 2.0. 昨天，在 FORCE LINK AI 创新巡展·武汉站上，火山引擎正式发布并升级了四款豆包大模型，包括豆包大模型 1.6 升级版、豆包大模型 1.6 lite、豆包语音合成模型 2.0 以及豆包声音复刻模型 2.0。

    Doubao Large Model 1.6 : The first model in China to natively support "tiered adjustment of thinking length," offering four thinking modes: Minimal, Low, Medium, and High, helping enterprises achieve a flexible balance between effect, latency, and cost;

    Doubao Large Model 1.6 lite : A lightweight model, focusing on high cost-effectiveness and faster inference speed, showing a 14% improvement over 1.5 pro in enterprise-level scenario evaluations, and a 53.3% reduction in usage cost within the mainstream input range;

    Doubao Speech Synthesis Model 2.0 and Voice Cloning Model 2.0 bring stronger emotional expressiveness and the ability to read complex formulas, with reading accuracy reaching 90% in comprehensive subject tests for primary and secondary schools.

In addition, Volcengine also launched the "Intelligent Model Routing" feature, supporting intelligent invocation of various mainstream models such as Doubao, DeepSeek, Qwen, and Kimi. Users can automatically select the optimal model based on three schemes: "Balanced Mode," "Effect Priority Mode," and "Cost Priority Mode." 此外，火山引擎还推出了「智能模型路由」功能，支持豆包、DeepSeek、Qwen、Kimi 等多种主流模型的智能调用，用户可根据「平衡模式」「效果优先模式」「成本优先模式」三种方案自动选择最优模型。

According to reports, in actual tests, this feature can reduce overall costs by over 70% in cost-priority mode. 据介绍，在实测中，该功能在成本优先模式下可将综合成本降低超过 70%。

item.title: 智元推出工业级交互式机器人精灵 G2，支持 24 小时工厂作业
item.guid: 智元推出工业级交互式机器人精灵-G2，支持-24-小时工厂作业
item.description:
Yesterday, ZHIYUAN Robotics officially released its new generation industrial-grade interactive embodied operational robot, "Spirit G2." 昨天，智元机器人正式发布新一代工业级交互式具身作业机器人「精灵 G2」。

This product is positioned as a versatile "hexagonal warrior" for multiple scenarios, possessing broad adaptability in industrial, logistics, guidance, and other fields. 该产品定位为多场景通用的「六边形战士」，在工业、物流、导览等领域具备广泛适配能力。

The official statement revealed that Spirit G2 had secured hundreds of millions of yuan in orders before its debut and simultaneously commenced its first batch of commercial deliveries. 官方透露，精灵 G2 在首发前已斩获数亿元订单，并同步开启首批商用交付。

The G2 robot has undergone a comprehensive upgrade in hardware and interactive intelligence: 精灵 G2 在硬件与交互智能方面全面升级：

    It adopts high-performance joint actuators and high-precision torque sensors, supporting omnidirectional obstacle avoidance and high-precision force control operations in all scenarios;

    The waist features a 3-degree-of-freedom design, enabling human-like bending, twisting, and lateral swinging;

    Equipped with the world's first cross-wrist force-controlled arm, allowing ordinary users to quickly deploy without complex parameter adjustments;

    Supports dual-battery hot-swapping and autonomous recharging, meeting 24-hour factory production line rhythms.

In terms of interactive intelligence, the G2 robot, based on its self-developed large models GO-1 and GE-1, possesses the ability to "understand a sentence and complete an entire task," and can pre-enact actions in visual space to handle long-term complex tasks. 在交互智能方面，精灵 G2 基于自研大模型 GO-1 与 GE-1，具备「听懂一句话、完成一整个任务」的能力，并能在视觉空间中预演动作，应对长周期复杂任务。

Thanks to the NVIDIA Jetson Thor T5000's local computing power of up to 2070 TFLOPS (FP4), the G2 can complete multi-sensor data processing with a latency of less than 10 ms. 得益于英伟达 Jetson Thor T5000 高达 2070 TFLOPS（FP4）的本地算力，G2 可低于 10 ms 延迟完成多路传感器数据处理。

At the press conference, the G2 robot demonstrated its ultra-low latency teleoperation function, allowing a remote operator in Beijing to precisely control a robot at the Shanghai site to complete an archery task, showcasing its high precision and low latency characteristics. 发布会现场，精灵 G2 展示了超低延迟遥操作功能，远程操作者在北京即可精准控制上海现场的机器人完成射箭任务，展现了高精度与低延时特性。

Zhiyuan also showcased real-world application cases of the G2 robot in scenarios such as automotive parts production, precision assembly, logistics sorting, and commercial guidance. The official statement indicates that it will also be expanded to areas such as security checks, inspections, education, and scientific research in the future. 智元方面还展示了精灵 G2 在汽车零部件生产、精密装配、物流分拣与商业导览等场景的真实应用案例。官方表示，未来还将拓展至安检、巡检、教育与科研等领域。

Yao Maoqing, partner at Zhiyuan Robotics, stated that he hopes the G2 robot can liberate humans from repetitive, arduous, and dangerous labor, thereby promoting the advent of an era of large-scale application of intelligent robots. 智元机器人合伙人姚卯青表示，希望精灵 G2 能够将人类从重复、繁重、危险的劳动中解放出来，推动智能机器人规模化应用时代的到来。

item.title: 尼康发布全画幅微单 ZR 与两款 APS-C 新镜头
item.guid: 尼康发布全画幅微单-ZR-与两款-APS-C-新镜头
item.description:
Yesterday, Nikon officially released its new full-frame mirrorless camera, the ZR , with a body-only price of 13,999 yuan , now available on JD.com. 昨天，尼康正式发布全画幅微单新品 ZR ，单机身售价 13999 元 ，现已在京东开售。

This camera emphasizes lightweight design and professional video performance, with a body weight of approximately 540 grams (approx. 630 grams including battery and memory card). It features the same 24-megapixel partially stacked full-frame CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 processor as the Z6 III, supporting 7.5 stops of five-axis image stabilization. 该机主打轻量化与专业视频性能，机身重量约 540 克（含电池与存储卡约 630 克），搭载与 Z6 III 相同的 2400 万像素部分堆栈式全画幅 CMOS 传感器与 EXPEED 7 处理器，支持 7.5 档五轴防抖。

The ZR deeply integrates RED's subsidiary technology, supporting internal recording of 12-bit R3D NE RAW at up to 6K/60p and 4K/120p. It has built-in Log3G10 and REDWideGamutRGB color spaces, offers over 15 stops of dynamic range, and features dual native ISOs of 800 and 6400. ZR 深度融合子公司 RED 技术，支持最高 6K/60p 与 4K/120p 的 12 比特 R3D NE RAW 内录，内置 Log3G10 与 REDWideGamutRGB 色彩空间，提供 15 档以上动态范围，并具备 ISO 800 与 6400 双原生感光度。

In terms of recording specifications, users can choose from various formats such as N-RAW, Apple ProRes RAW HQ, and ProRes 422 HQ. 录制规格方面，用户可选择 N-RAW、Apple ProRes RAW HQ、ProRes 422 HQ 等多种格式。

The camera is equipped with a 4-inch, 1000-nit high-brightness touchscreen, supporting LUT preview and custom shortcut operations. The audio section uses 32-bit float recording and incorporates Nokia OZO Audio technology. The body features a magnesium alloy and fanless passive cooling design, allowing for continuous recording of approximately 2 hours of 6K video. 该机配备 4 英寸 1000 尼特高亮触控屏，支持 LUT 预览与自定义快捷操作；音频部分采用 32 位浮点录音，并引入诺基亚 OZO Audio 技术。机身采用镁合金与无风扇被动散热设计，可连续录制约 2 小时 6K 视频。

In photo mode, the ZR inherits the AI object recognition and high-speed autofocus system from the Z9 and Z8, with a maximum continuous shooting speed of 120 frames/second. 照片模式下，ZR 继承 Z9 与 Z8 的 AI 对象识别与高速自动对焦系统，最高连拍速度可达 120 张/秒。

Meanwhile, the Nikon Z-mount APS-C lens lineup welcomes two new members: 与此同时，尼康 Z 卡口 APS-C 镜头群再添两款新成员：

    Nikkor Z DX 16-50mm f/2.8 VR: Constant f/2.8 aperture, built-in VR stabilization, priced at 6,299 yuan; bundled with the Z50 II kit, priced at 10,899 yuan.

    Nikkor Z DX Macro 35mm f/1.7: The first standard macro lens for APS-C format supporting 1:1 magnification, priced at 2,999 yuan.

item.title: 正面对标闲鱼，小红书内测「快捷售卖」功能
item.guid: 正面对标闲鱼，小红书内测「快捷售卖」功能
item.description:
According to "Tech Planet," Xiaohongshu is currently internally testing a "Quick Sell" feature, allowing users to directly attach links to idle goods below their posts or send product cards in chats to complete transactions. 据「Tech星球」报道，近期，小红书正在内测「快捷售卖」功能，用户可在笔记下方直接挂载闲置商品链接，或在聊天中发送商品卡片完成交易。

Unlike previously requiring a 1,000 yuan deposit to open a store, "Quick Sell" significantly lowers the barrier, allowing ordinary users to open a "mini-shop." 与此前需缴纳 1000 元保证金开设店铺不同，「快捷售卖」大幅降低了门槛，普通用户即可开设「小卖部」。

Data shows that the browsing volume for "second-hand idle" related terms on the Xiaohongshu platform has exceeded 1.53 billion, with discussion volume reaching 24.982 million. 数据显示，小红书平台内「二手闲置」相关词条浏览量已突破 15.3 亿，讨论量高达 2498.2 万。

However, past transactions often relied on third-party platforms or private arrangements, posing risks. The launch of "Quick Sell" this time means the platform hopes to keep transactions within the site and expand new commercialization paths. 但过去交易多依赖第三方平台或私下完成，存在风险。此次上线「快捷售卖」，意味着平台希望将交易留在站内，拓展新的商业化路径。

According to the rules, users can set product name, price, quantity, delivery method, and shipping fees, with a maximum price of 10,000 yuan per single item. The platform will charge a 0.6% basic software service fee for each order, similar to the Xianyu model. 根据规则，用户可设定商品名称、价格、数量、交货方式及运费，单件商品价格上限为 1 万元。平台将对每笔订单收取 0.6% 的基础软件服务费，与闲鱼模式类似。

Some analyses point out that with Zhuanzhuan announcing the closure of its C2C free market, the competition between Xiaohongshu and Xianyu will become more direct. The former relies on its content community to enter e-commerce, while the latter continuously explores community-oriented directions, and their points of convergence are increasing. 有分析指出，随着转转宣布关闭 C2C 自由市场，小红书与闲鱼的竞争将更加直接。前者依托内容社区切入电商，后者则在社区化方向不断探索，二者的交汇点正在增加。

However, the "Quick Sell" function is still in its early stages, and mechanisms such as express delivery, after-sales service, and traffic distribution are not yet perfect, with some sellers reporting limited order volume. 不过，目前「快捷售卖」功能仍处于早期阶段，快递、售后、流量分配等机制尚不完善，部分卖家反馈出单量有限。

item.title: 2025 双 11 全面升级，淘宝天猫发布 6 款 AI 导购应用
item.guid: 2025-双-11-全面升级，淘宝天猫发布-6-款-AI-导购应用
item.description:
Yesterday, Taobao Tmall announced that the 2025 Tmall Double 11 will officially go on sale at 8 PM on October 20th, ushering in the first Double 11 with comprehensive AI implementation, and Taobao Flash Sale will also fully participate. 昨天，淘宝天猫宣布，2025 天猫双 11 将于 10 月 20 日晚 8 点正式开卖，并迎来首个 AI 全面落地的双 11，淘宝闪购也将全面参与。

Jialuo, President of Tmall, stated that Double 11 has become the biggest growth opportunity for brands throughout the year, and under the new circumstances, it will open up new historical growth opportunities for brands. 天猫总裁家洛表示，双11 已成为品牌全年最大增长机会，在全新背景下将为品牌开启新的增长历史机遇。

Kaifu, President of Search and Recommendation Intelligence for Alibaba's China Digital Commerce Group, pointed out: "User-friendly AI is the testing standard for Taobao's AI applications. We hope AI can solve consumer pain points and also enable merchants to achieve growth." 阿里巴巴中国电商事业群搜推智能总裁凯夫则指出：「好用的 AI 是淘宝 AI 应用的检验标准，我们希望 AI 能解决消费痛点，也能让商家获得增长。」

According to reports, the platform uses AI to more accurately understand and organize 2 billion products, achieving a double-digit improvement in traffic matching efficiency: search relevance under complex semantics increased by 20 percentage points, recommended information flow click-through rate increased by 10%, and merchant ad ROI increased by 12%. 据介绍，平台通过 AI 对 20 亿商品进行更精准理解与组织，实现流量匹配效率双位数提升：复杂语义下搜索相关性提升 20 个百分点，推荐信息流点击量提升 10%，商家广告 ROI 提升 12%。

On the consumer side, Taobao Tmall simultaneously launched 6 AI shopping guide applications: 在消费者侧，淘宝天猫同步推出 6 款 AI 导购应用：

    "AI Universal Search" can understand complex semantics and provide shopping guides;

    "AI Help Me Choose" guides precise product filtering through dialogue;

    "Pailitao" (Snap & Search) is upgraded to multi-modal AI search, supporting better prices for the same item and similar recommendations;

    Homepage search generates "category lists" based on network-wide reputation and can answer shopping questions in real-time;

    "AI Virtual Try-on" supports one-click try-on;

    Each user will also receive a customized "AI List."

On the merchant side, Taobao Tmall has established an AI operations team, covering aspects such as art design, data analysis, and customer service. 在商家侧，淘宝天猫已组建 AI 经营团队，覆盖美工、数据分析、客服等环节。

Data shows that AI art designers generate an average of 200 million images and 5 million videos monthly, increasing product click-through rates by 10%; AI data analysis has cumulatively generated over 10 million reports, receiving 85% positive feedback from merchants; AI customer service "Dianxiaomi 5.0" helps merchants reduce daily costs by 20 million yuan and brings an incremental GMV of 19.12 million yuan. 数据显示，AI 美工月均生成 2 亿张图片和 500 万个视频，商品点击率提升 10%；AI 数据分析累计生成超 1000 万份报告，获 85% 商家好评；AI 客服「店小蜜 5.0」帮助商家日均降本 2000 万元，带来 GMV 增量 1912 万元。

Furthermore, Tmall Double 11 pre-sale data shows that within the first hour, 35 brands achieved sales exceeding 100 million yuan, and 1,802 brands doubled their sales. This year, the platform's computing power increased by 40 times, extending the perception of user behavior sequences from a six-month cycle to 10 years, significantly improving recommendation accuracy and driving a 25% increase in purchase efficiency. 此外，天猫双11 预售数据显示，首小时已有 35 个品牌成交破亿，1802 个品牌成交翻倍。今年平台算力提升 40 倍，对用户行为序列的感知从半年周期延长至 10 年，推荐精准度显著提升，带动购买效率提升 25%。

During this year's Double 11 entire cycle, Tmall will issue 50 billion yuan in consumer vouchers to subsidize users. Some of these will be uniformly decided and issued by the AI "Smart Engine," with pilot data showing a 15% increase in conversion rate. 今年双11 全周期天猫将发放 500 亿元消费券补贴用户，部分由 AI「智惠引擎」统一决策发放，试点数据显示转化率提升 15%。

Meanwhile, Tmall flagship stores have upgraded to 3.0 "Intelligent State," using AI to perceive user needs in real-time and provide personalized displays and services tailored to individual users. 同时，天猫旗舰店升级为 3.0「智能态」，通过 AI 实时感知用户需求，提供千人千面的个性化展示与服务。

item.title: 京东外卖试点取消超时罚款：25 城启用「服务分」机制
item.guid: 京东外卖试点取消超时罚款：25-城启用「服务分」机制
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, JD Waimai recently announced a pilot program in 25 cities nationwide, including Shenzhen, Nanjing, Harbin, and Wuhan, to cancel fines for rider order timeouts, replacing them with a "service score" management mechanism. 据新浪财经报道，近日，京东外卖宣布在深圳、南京、哈尔滨、武汉等全国 25 个城市试点取消骑手订单超时罚款，改为启用「服务分」管理机制。

Under the new rules, if a rider experiences a delivery timeout, cash will no longer be directly deducted. Instead, corresponding service points will be deducted based on the timeout duration, shifting the management approach from punitive constraints to positive incentives. 根据新规，骑手若出现配送超时，将不再直接扣除现金，而是依据超时区间扣除相应服务分，推动管理方式从处罚约束向正向激励转变。

In addition to JD Waimai, Ele.me and Meituan are also advancing similar initiatives. 除了京东外卖之外，饿了么和美团也在推进类似举措。

In the "2025 Ele.me Platform Algorithm and Labor Rules Agreement" released in September, Ele.me explicitly stated that it will gradually cancel timeout deductions and improve riders' working experience by adding intelligent AI assistant voice reminders, optimizing the "forced offline" function, and other methods. 饿了么在 9 月份公布的《2025 年度「饿了么」平台算法和劳动规则协议》中明确提出，将逐步取消超时扣款，并通过增加智能 AI 助手语音提醒、优化「强制下线」功能等方式，改善骑手的劳动体验。

Meituan, on its part, stated that it will completely abolish timeout fines by the end of 2025 and has already piloted the "Anzhun Card" mechanism in Quanzhou and other places, replacing the original fines with a system of deducting points for timeouts and adding points for punctuality. 美团方面则表示，将在 2025 年年底前全面取消超时罚款，并已在泉州等地试点「安准卡」机制，以超时扣分、准时加分的方式替代原有罚款。

As of August, Meituan has implemented a timeout exemption mechanism in 22 cities, replacing simple financial penalties with training and learning. 截至 8 月，美团已在 22 个城市推行超时免罚机制，并通过培训学习代替单纯的经济处罚。

item.title: 咖啡遇上香氛：M Stand × Sagrada Madre 跨界合作亮相
item.guid: 咖啡遇上香氛：M-Stand-×-Sagrada-Madre-跨界合作亮相
item.description:
Yesterday, boutique coffee chain M Stand announced a cross-industry collaboration with Argentine natural handmade incense brand Sagrada Madre, officially launching a sensory co-creation project themed "Falling into the 'Fragrant' Wilderness Secret Realm." 昨天，连锁精品咖啡品牌 M Stand 宣布与阿根廷天然手工线香品牌 Sagrada Madre 展开跨界合作，正式推出以「坠入『香』野秘境」为主题的感官共创企划。

It is understood that this collaboration aims to create a unique daily experience for consumers through the combination of coffee and fragrance. 据悉，此次联名旨在通过咖啡与香氛的结合，为消费者营造独特的日常体验。

In terms of product design, M Stand has refreshed its cup body shape, drawing inspiration from the rich mellowness of coffee and the stable texture of wood. The raw wood-like appearance echoes the natural properties of incense sticks, conveying a natural aesthetic concept. 在产品设计上，M Stand 焕新杯身造型，灵感源自咖啡的醇厚与木质的沉稳质感。原木触感的外观呼应线香的天然属性，传递自然美学理念。

At the same time, both parties also launched a co-branded natural handmade incense gift box, featuring four scents: Sandalwood, Palo Santo with Orange Peel and Lemongrass, Palo Santo, and Yagra, encouraging consumers to light an incense stick while reading, meditating, or working to create a moment of tranquility. 与此同时，双方还推出联名天然手工线香礼盒，包含檀香、秘鲁圣木·橙皮·香茅、秘鲁圣木与雅格拉四款香型，鼓励消费者在阅读、冥想或办公时点燃一支香，营造片刻宁静。

item.title: 《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》确认引进，系列最终章即将上映
item.guid: 《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》确认引进，系列最终章即将上映
item.description:
The animated film "Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Final Impact," directed by Hideaki Anno, has been confirmed for introduction to China and will soon land on the big screen. 庵野秀明执导的动画电影《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》确认引进国内，即将登陆大银幕。

As the final chapter of the new theatrical film series, this work, after years of production and anticipation, is finally set to officially meet its audience. 这部作品作为新剧场版系列的最终章，历经多年制作与等待，终于迎来与观众的正式见面。

The film continues the series' consistent depth and profound meaning, combining sci-fi with themes of humanity, and revolves around characters like Shinji as they face ultimate choices and challenges. 影片延续了系列一贯的深度与内涵，将科幻与人性主题相结合，围绕真嗣等角色展开最终的抉择与挑战。

Hideaki Anno explores themes such as "love," "courage," and "responsibility" through his narrative, allowing the audience to experience emotional resonance and reflection amidst a visual and auditory feast. 庵野秀明通过叙事探讨「爱」「勇气」「责任」等议题，让观众在视听盛宴中获得情感共鸣与思考。

Since its TV premiere in 1995, the series has accumulated a massive fanbase thanks to its unique worldview and profound themes. 自 1995 年 TV 版首播以来，该系列凭借独特的世界观与深刻主题积累了庞大粉丝群体。

The introduction of this final chapter is seen as a dream-come-true journey, allowing a generation of viewers to experience the final adventure with the characters on the big screen. 此次最终章的引进，被视为一次圆梦之旅，让一代观众能够在大银幕上与角色共同经历最后的冒险。

item.title: 《阳光俱乐部》清华路演，黄晓明引用加缪名言谈化解焦虑
item.guid: 《阳光俱乐部》清华路演，黄晓明引用加缪名言谈化解焦虑
item.description:
Recently, the first stop of the national roadshow for the film "Sunshine Club" was held at Tsinghua University. Director Wei Shujun, along with lead actors Huang Xiaoming, Zu Feng, Jia Zhangke, and chief producer Wang Caitao, engaged in face-to-face discussions with students, creating a lively atmosphere. 日前，电影《阳光俱乐部》全国路演首站在清华大学举行，导演魏书钧携主演黄晓明、祖峰、贾樟柯及总制片人王才涛与学生面对面交流，现场氛围热烈。

In his post-screening sharing, Huang Xiaoming quoted Camus' famous saying, "One must imagine Sisyphus happy," and stated that the character "Wu You" carries a modern metaphor, demonstrating resilience and an optimistic spirit when facing difficulties. He revealed that he intentionally gained weight to better embody the role and deeply engaged with the lives of individuals with intellectual disabilities. 黄晓明在映后分享中引用加缪名言「应当认为西西弗斯是幸福的」，并表示角色「吴优」承载了现代隐喻，展现了面对困境时的钝感力与乐观精神。他透露为贴近角色特意增重，并深入接触智力障碍群体的生活。

When Zu Feng talked about the character "Wu Di," he pointed out that the character's transformation reflects the helplessness of ordinary people seeking spiritual solace in difficult situations. Jia Zhangke plays Dr. Cai in the film, which is his most significant role to date, and he jokingly said, "It's my first time playing a highly educated character." 祖峰谈及角色「吴迪」时指出，人物的转变体现了普通人在困境中寻找心灵寄托的无奈。贾樟柯则在片中出演蔡博士，这是他迄今为止戏份最重的角色，他笑称「第一次演高学历角色」。

Producer Wang Caitao emphasized that the mother character in the film symbolizes "a transparent and shining pearl," hoping to convey the theme of bravely pursuing life and love. Huang Xiaoming also responded to the widely discussed "loofah soup" meme online, believing it represents "suffocating love," but also a product of a specific historical context. 制片人王才涛强调影片中的母亲角色象征「透明而闪耀的明珠」，希望传递勇敢追求生活与爱情的主题。黄晓明也回应了网络热议的「丝瓜汤」梗，认为这是一种「令人窒息的爱」，但同时是特定时代环境的产物。

During an interaction with students, Huang Xiaoming shared his mental adjustments for dealing with external criticism, urging everyone to "aspire to kindness, aspire to love, aspire to sunshine." Jia Zhangke, on the other hand, quoted a line from the film to encourage the audience: "Don't let yesterday's gloom overshadow today's sunshine." 在与学生互动中，黄晓明分享了自己应对外界非议的心态调整，呼吁大家「向往善良、向往爱、向往阳光」。贾樟柯则引用片中台词鼓励观众「不要让昨天的阴霾笼罩今天的阳光」。

The film "Sunshine Club" will be released nationwide on October 25. 电影《阳光俱乐部》将于 10 月 25 日全国上映。

item.title: 重大革命历史题材影片《火种》正式上映
item.guid: 重大革命历史题材影片《火种》正式上映
item.description:
Yesterday, "The Spark," a major revolutionary historical film directed by Chen Jianfei, written by Zhou Zhentian, and starring Fu Dalong and Jiang Wu, officially premiered in cinemas nationwide. 昨天，由陈剑飞执导、周振天编剧，富大龙、姜武领衔主演的重大革命历史题材电影《火种》正式登陆全国院线。

The film, refined over 5 years, centers on a "century-spanning covenant of faith." It uses a dual-timeline narrative structure to depict Li Dazhao's revolutionary journey from 1919 to 1927, as well as the story of the "100-day top-secret capture" by public security officers in New China in 1951. 影片历时 5 年打磨，以「跨越百年的信仰之约」为核心，通过双时空叙事结构展现李大钊在 1919 年至 1927 年间的革命历程，以及 1951 年新中国公安干警「100 天绝密缉捕」的故事。

At its premiere, the film received high praise from Li Dazhao's direct granddaughter, Li Lequn, and various other guests. 影片在首映礼上获得李大钊嫡孙女李乐群及多方嘉宾的高度评价。

With its deep historical research and artistic expression, "The Spark" not only recreates the social landscape of Beiping in the early 20th century but also breaks the monolithic narrative of traditional "red" themes through vivid character portrayals, allowing audiences to feel the power of faith amidst the intertwining of history and reality. 凭借深厚的史料考据与艺术化表达，「火种」不仅还原了 20 世纪初北平的社会风貌，也通过鲜活的人物群像打破了传统红色题材的单一化叙事，让观众在历史与现实的交织中感受到信仰的力量。
